additional_commands.label: setname
additional_commands.about: To replace default 'visitor' name with your name

options.label: about
options.value: Hi! I'm Miguel Mendez, a software engineer currently working on fraud detection with Liberty Mutual in Dallas, Texas. This is my portfolio, where I show off what I've created, what I learned, and where I've been. Feel free to play around with this interactive portfolio to learn more about me.

options.label: skills
options.value:
I'm a versatile full-stack software developer, capable of turning ideas into robust web applications. My experience expands from splashy react web applications that users love, to scalable backend AI systems serving millions of requests, creating and maintaining SQL databases to maintain data integrity and query efficiency, and even a little bit of blockchain development as well.

I have expertise with React, Node.js, Redux, Tailwind CSS, RESTful APIs, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Bun.js, Solidity, as well as backend database administration and management with MySQL, and PostgresSQL as well.

options.label: experience
options.value: I've been working professionaly as a software engineer since 2023, and obtained my Bachelors of Science in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Dallas in 2023.

data.label: Thrasher's Family Holdings LLC
data.value:
Software engineer working on two big projects, AmnestyOne, and Values Cart.
Year: 2022-2025

options.label: projects
options.value: I've had the pleasure of working on a diverse set of projects that showcase my skills and creativity.

data.label: AmnestyOne
data.value: Built a platform showcasing political prisoner cases, empowering users to advocate for their release by sending handwritten letters to members of Congress through our website. Built using Bun, React, Next.js, Stripe, Postgres, and Vercel.

data.label: Concentrated Liquidity Compounder
data.value: Designed and developed a dynamic web3 e-commerce website, featuring several crypto investment strategies for concentrated liquidity compounders to grow customers savings.

data.label: Values Cart Chrome Extension
data.value: Created a chrome extension that intuitively influences consumer spending on Brands hosted on the Amazon marketplace.

data.label: Values Cart Web Reputation System
data.value: Built the backend web reputation system for Values Cart which aligns customer spending with their ethical/political values using MySQL and Microsoft Azure.

data.label: MIPS assembly calculator
data.value: Built a binary to hexadecimal to decimal conversion calculator written in the MIPS assembly language. I used bitmasking to do some of the conversions, and in the process learned about invisible line break characters.

options.label: contact
options.value:
Feel free to reach out! You can contact me for any inquiries or collaborations.
Email: miguelmendez1208@gmail.com
